ygData.subject: RE: Re: Optional locations
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow, also check out the other pictures of this sight, especially Flight1 and Flight2.jpg!  Looks like they had in mind some sort of Tinkered flying machine!  I
ygData.messageBody:
Wow, also check out the other pictures of this sight, especially Flight1 and
Flight2.jpg! Looks like they had in mind some sort of Tinkered flying
machine! I think I'd rather have this than the Fireworks. =)

http://n.ethz.ch/student/brunoh/download/flight1.jpg
<http://n.ethz.ch/student/brunoh/download/flight1.jpg>

http://n.ethz.ch/student/brunoh/download/flight2.jpg
<http://n.ethz.ch/student/brunoh/download/flight2.jpg>

Kilkin - 26th Gemchopper - Fen Ro




-----Original Message-----
From: Catbik Tinkerton [mailto:catbik@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 07, 1999 12:56 AM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Re: Optional locations

From: "Catbik Tinkerton" <catbik@...>


>I was really hopeing it would yield tinkering info because
Tergon says he
>shot bugglepup with one of his contraptions. (a tinker
made shotgun of
>some
>sort??) :) Anyone ever finish all of Tergon's quests to
the end?

Check out this screenshot from the defunct emuQ webpage.
After you pick up
your jaw from the floor, look at what he has in his range
and ammo slot.

http://n.ethz.ch/student/brunoh/download/poorguy.jpg

That means that the graphics for the guns are at least in
the game =)

mmmmmmm... guns

Catbik Tinkerton AKA The Terminator
